entries.meaning: (countable) The condition of being pregnant; an instance of this.
examples: News that the duchess is in the "very early stages" of pregnancy with the third-in-line to the throne was officially released after she was taken to the King Edward VII hospital in central London, suffering from hyperemesis gravidarun, very acute morning sickness.

entries.meaning: The period of time this condition prevails.
(uncountable) The progression of stages from conception to birth.
